mapper.update: UPDATE SIGN_RECORD SET MASK = #{mask},SIGN_DAYS = SIGN_DAYS+1 WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT MASK mask,SIGN_DAYS signDays FROM SIGN_RECORD WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SIGN_RECORD(USER_ID, DATE_MATH, MASK, SIGN_DAYS) VALUES (#{userId},#{dateMath},#{mask},#{signDays});
mapper.select: SELECT S1.USERNAME_ username, S1.DEPARMENT_ department, S1.POSITION_ position, S1.TELEPHONE_ telephone, S2.SIGN_DAYS signDays FROM STD_EM_INFORMATION S1,SIGN_RECORD S2 WHERE S2.USER_ID = S1.ID_ LIMIT #{begin},#{nums}
